Join Our Team - Island Grill Home About Press CAREERS Join Our Team Careers Menu Our Menu Catering Gallery Locations Contact Us Join Our Team TEAM MEMBER Kingston, Saint Ann, Saint James, Manchester APPLY NOW by emailing us your CV and contact information at careers@islandgrillja.com. This job creates the Island Grill experience, by providing customers with delightful food and service, and maintaining a clean and comfortable restaurant environment.  Team Members are responsible for following Island Grill‚Äôs Core Beliefs ISLAND GRILL IS SEEKING TO RECRUIT COMPETENT AND SUITABLY QUALIFIED & EXPERIENCED INDIVIDUALS TO APPLY FOR THE POSITIONS OF TEAM MEMBER -  Kingston, Saint Ann, Saint James, Manchester Job Summary: This job creates the Island Grill experience, by providing customers with delightful food and service, and maintaining a clean and comfortable restaurant environment.  Team Members are responsible for following Island Grill‚Äôs Core Beliefs. Key Responsibilities: 1.            Delights customers with great Island food and service ‚Ä¢             Provides prompt, professional and personable customer service ‚Ä¢             Greets every customer in a welcoming manner ‚Ä¢             Responds to customer needs and says ‚Äòthank you‚Äô to every customer ‚Ä¢             Prepares great, consistent freshly prepared food by following our recipe standards and procedures ‚Ä¢             Achieves great QSC results and is always ‚Äòcustomer ready‚Äô 2.            Maintains quality restaurant operations ‚Ä¢             Follows company policy and workstation procedures ‚Ä¢             Co-operates and is supportive of co-workers, Supervisors & Managers ‚Ä¢             Coaches others to encourage learning, positive feedback & improve performance ‚Ä¢             Responds appropriately to coaching from others ‚Ä¢             Keeps a clean and organized workspace ‚Ä¢             Maintains food safety and sanitation standards ‚Ä¢             Keeps a really clean restaurant by completing cleaning tasks to standard ‚Ä¢             Follows inventory standards for stocking, dating, rotating and storing ‚Ä¢             Always follows policies and procedures on safety and security ‚Ä¢             Communicates important information to Management Team 3.            Contributes to our efficiency and profitability ‚Ä¢             Assembles food orders promptly for great thru-put and smooth service ‚Ä¢             Maintains correct portion control ‚Ä¢             Follows cash handling procedures ‚Ä¢             Follows inventory stocking and recording procedures ‚Ä¢             Contributes to restaurant goals for increasing sales and reducing costs ‚Ä¢             Maintains regular attendance and consistent punctuality Qualification and Skills Needed: Applicants must possess any one (1) of the following: CSEC Passes at Grade 1-3 -¬†Food & Nutrition -          Home Management -          Human & Social Biology -          Agricultural Science HEART/NTA NCTVET Passes in - Food Preparation Level 1or 2 -          Commis Chef -          Customer Service -Display excellent written, verbal communication and listening skills -Willingness to work flexible schedules APPLY NOW Island Grill ¬© 2025 A Mopro Website Back to Top

Enjoy half off all bourbon and beer, and indulge in $15 specialty burgers, all evening long! üçîü•É Tonight`s specialty burgers: BLT Burger Bacon, lettuce, tomato, &  garlic aioli Caprese Burger Sliced mozzarella, tomato, arugula, & balsamic #islandwaygrill #bourbonbeerburgers #mondaydeal #waterfrontdining #bltburgers #capreseburger #clearwaterbeach #baystarrestaurantgroup 6 0 Open post by island_way_grill with ID 18094970575727907 Visit us this Saturday from noon - 3PM for our new Saturday Lunch & Brunch Menu! ‚òÄÔ∏è We are featuring delicious handhelds, as well as some classic brunch dishes with an Island Way twist, such as Cranberry Pecan Chicken Salad, Chicken & Waffles, Avocado Toast, Quiche, and more! #islandwaygrill #saturdaylunch #cranberrychickensalad #chickenandwaffles #fishtacos #avocadotoast #quiche #waterfrontdining #clearwaterfl #baystarrestaurantgroup 11 0 Open post by island_way_grill with ID 18078299465299976 Our mocktails make the perfect weekday drink!
